					<h1 style="text-align: center;"><span style="color: #ff0000;">We will be closed for Thanksgiving from Thurs, Nov 24 thru Sun Nov 27, reopening for our normal business hours on Monday, Nov 28.</span></h1>
<h1 style="text-align: center;"><span style="color: #0000ff;">Our normal business hours are Monday – Friday 7AM-4:30PM & Sat. 7AM – Noon</span></h1>
<h1 style="text-align: center;"><span style="color: #0000ff;">Thank You</span></h1>
<h1>PK Metals is a recognized leader in the scrap recycling industry, working to protect and preserve our environment for over 30 years.</h1>
<div class="hr"></div>
<div class="one_fourth">
<h3>Our Green Commitment</h3>
<p>We turn tens of millions of pounds of scrap metal, plastics and electronics into useful commodities.</p>
<p> </p>
<p><a href="https://www.pkmetals.com/our-green-commitment/" target="_self" class="button small normal ">Learn More →</a></p></div>
<div class="one_fourth">
<h3>What We Recycle</h3>
<p>PK Metals is a full-service scrap recycling facility. Ferrous scrap metal, plastic and e-waste are just a few of the materials we recycle.</p>
<p> </p>
<p><a href="https://www.pkmetals.com/long-island-commerical-residential-recycling/" target="_self" class="button small normal ">More About Our Services →</a></p></div>
<div class="one_fourth">
<h3>Who We Are</h3>
<p>PK Metals is a family operated facility that’s been handling the recycling needs of corporations, government agencies and the public since 1979.</p>
<p> </p>
<p><a href="https://www.pkmetals.com/about-pk-metals/" target="_self" class="button small normal ">More About Us →</a></p></div>
<div class="one_fourth last">
<h3>e-Green Recycling Management</h3>
<p><img class="alignleft" src="https://i0.wp.com/www.pkmetals.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/03/e-green.jpg?resize=54%2C54&ssl=1" alt="" width="54" height="54">Learn about our affiliate company e-Green Recycling Management.</p>
<p> </p>
<p><a href="http://egreenrecyclingmanagement.com/" target="_self" class="button small normal ">Learn More →</a></p></div>
<div class="clear"></div>
